div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 531 Nedan, c. 10 km. N of Veliko Târnovo, Bulgaria, 1964 Burial: c. 125-100 B.C. (T) Contents: 103 AR. Pot hoard Maroneia: 1 spread-flan tetradr. Thasos: 102 spread-flan tetradr. Disposition: Veliko Târnovo Gerasimov, BIAB 29 (1966), p. 212
